verses.verse: Thus hath the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069> shewed<WH7200> unto me; and, behold, he formed<WH3335> grasshoppers<WH1462> in the beginning<WH8462> of the shooting up<WH5927> of the latter growth<WH3954>; and, lo, it was the latter growth<WH3954> after<WH310> the king's<WH4428> mowings<WH1488>. grasshoppers: or, green worms

And it came to pass, that when they had made an end<WH3615> of eating<WH398> the grass<WH6212> of the land<WH776>, then I said<WH559>, O Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>, forgive<WH5545>, I beseech thee: by whom shall Jacob<WH3290> arise<WH6965>? for he is small<WH6996>. by: or, who of (or, for,) Jacob shall stand?
The LORD<WH3068> repented<WH5162> for this: It shall not be, saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068>.

Thus hath the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069> shewed<WH7200> unto me: and, behold, the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069> called<WH7121> to contend<WH7378> by fire<WH784>, and it devoured<WH398> the great<WH7227> deep<WH8415>, and did eat up<WH398> a part<WH2506>.
Then said<WH559> I, O Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>, cease<WH2308>, I beseech thee: by whom shall Jacob<WH3290> arise<WH6965>? for he is small<WH6996>. by: or, who of (or, for,) Jacob shall stand?
The LORD<WH3068> repented<WH5162> for this: This also shall not be, saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>.
Thus he shewed<WH7200> me: and, behold, the Lord<WH136> stood<WH5324> upon a wall<WH2346> made by a plumbline<WH594>, with a plumbline<WH594> in his hand<WH3027>.

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto me, Amos<WH5986>, what seest<WH7200> thou? And I said<WH559>, A plumbline<WH594>. Then said<WH559> the Lord<WH136>, Behold, I will set<WH7760> a plumbline<WH594> in the midst<WH7130> of my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478>: I will not again<WH3254> pass by<WH5674> them any more:

And the high places<WH1116> of Isaac<WH3446> shall be desolate<WH8074>, and the sanctuaries<WH4720> of Israel<WH3478> shall be laid waste<WH2717>; and I will rise<WH6965> against the house<WH1004> of Jeroboam<WH3379> with the sword<WH2719>.

Then Amaziah<WH558> the priest<WH3548> of Bethel<WH1008> sent<WH7971> to Jeroboam<WH3379> king<WH4428> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, Amos<WH5986> hath conspired<WH7194> against thee in the midst<WH7130> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>: the land<WH776> is not able<WH3201> to bear<WH3557> all his words<WH1697>.
For thus Amos<WH5986> saith<WH559>, Jeroboam<WH3379> shall die<WH4191> by the sword<WH2719>, and Israel<WH3478> shall surely<WH1540> be led away captive<WH1540> out of their own land<WH127>.

Also Amaziah<WH558> said<WH559> unto Amos<WH5986>, O thou seer<WH2374>, go<WH3212>, flee thee away<WH1272> into the land<WH776> of Judah<WH3063>, and there eat<WH398> bread<WH3899>, and prophesy<WH5012> there:

But prophesy<WH5012> not again<WH3254> any more at Bethel<WH1008>: for it is the king's<WH4428> chapel<WH4720>, and it is the king's<WH4467> court<WH1004>. chapel: or, sanctuary king's court: Heb. house of the kingdom

Then answered<WH6030> Amos<WH5986>, and said<WH559> to Amaziah<WH558>, I was no prophet<WH5030>, neither was I a prophet's<WH5030> son<WH1121>; but I was an herdman<WH951>, and a gatherer<WH1103> of sycomore fruit<WH8256>: sycomore: or, wild figs

And the LORD<WH3068> took<WH3947> me as I followed<WH310> the flock<WH6629>, and the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto me, Go<WH3212>, prophesy<WH5012> unto my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478>. as: Heb. from behind

Now therefore hear<WH8085> thou the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068>: Thou sayest<WH559>, Prophesy<WH5012> not against Israel<WH3478>, and drop<WH5197> not thy word against the house<WH1004> of Isaac<WH3446>.

Therefore thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068>; Thy wife<WH802> shall be an harlot<WH2181> in the city<WH5892>, and thy sons<WH1121> and thy daughters<WH1323> shall fall<WH5307> by the sword<WH2719>, and thy land<WH127> shall be divided<WH2505> by line<WH2256>; and thou shalt die<WH4191> in<WH5921> a polluted<WH2931> land<WH127>: and Israel<WH3478> shall surely<WH1540> go into captivity<WH1540> forth of his land<WH127>.
